storyInfo: The Doctor and Amiya complete their neural link, and with the help of the Black Crown, they prepare to cross over the boundary of Civilight Eterna. Amiya sees for herself the tale the Doctor once told her. The Cautus Infected spots a mysterious elf out in deep space.

attributes.content: I've never tried to use the Black Crown to access your thoughts before, Doctor—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Don't worry, Amiya.;I've opened up my heart and mind for you.

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She looks to her side, at the beam of bright, warm light gently tugging at her hand.
She shuts her eyes, and slowly lets out a sigh of relief.
I don't know where this journey of ours will lead us, Doctor, but I'll protect you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Under the watchful eye of Civilight Eterna, she gives your brow a light touch—
Your memories and emotions flow towards me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...It's strange.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They billow so gently as they flow, and the memories' edge is close at hand...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What did Theresa see back then—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya sees you, and Kal'tsit, and herself, and the many people aboard Rhodes Island.
As she walks deeper, the boundary of that one memory comes within reach. Curiosity and concern nearly cause her to forget her mission. She wants to reach out to touch it...
Touch upon the start of your memories. Chernobog, the Sarcophagus, and you, weakly stretching out your hand—
It looks like there's other memories too? Why are they so blurred?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who was—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You grab ahold of Amiya.

attributes.options: ...Were you lost?

attributes.content: I-I don't know. This is the first time I've ever dived so deep into someone else's mind. It's a very... odd feeling.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Good thing you pulled it off.

attributes.content: Thankfully, yes. Now, I can sense even the faintest of your thoughts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I can sense yours too.

attributes.content: Aha, you sure are relaxed right now!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I've got nothing to worry about with you around.
So, what should we do next?

attributes.content: Hold my hand tight, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll protect you on the road ahead. Theresa taught me everything about the role of King that day.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'She' awaits us, at the start of that path.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: I get what you're saying, but I cannot provide what you're asking for, as your request violates the underlying logic of DWDB-221E.
\nBut I do have a way to circumvent its limits, Kal'tsit—
\nUnfortunately, not even Theresa was able to penetrate this deeply. The risk was far beyond what she could bear—
\nYou're not here for answers? Then why are you so insistent I access this data that is useless to you?

attributes.content: 'I have no way of knowing if there will come a day that Amiya asks you the same question. But I hope that, in the darkness, she will find the way I lit for her.'
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: That was Kal'tsit's answer to me, Amiya.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: ...Could I ask you to look through all of Dr. Kal'tsit's access records for us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I would be happy to.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Her every doubt, her every insistence, each and every time she left in disappointment. I will show it all to you, unreserved.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: You have dove into the Civilight Eterna before, Amiya, but this time, what you seek lies far beyond your limits.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: It is a place where life on Terra cannot tread, for the time being, but perhaps you will find the chance to touch upon this knowledge that is not yours.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Because you have someone who walks alongside you. Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.options: Of me?

attributes.content: You will quickly understand what I mean, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Follow me, Amiya. Follow me to—
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: 'Civilization's Singularity'.
A great hallway of pure white circles around a central point that defies comprehension. The Singularity.
An unending stream of complex information flows from it, but the strands you manage to snatch hold of are still within your understanding.
Amiya cannot see the way you entered, but after an interminably long time walking down the corridor, she finds herself back where she started.
You noticed, Amiya.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: The stagnation of civilization does not mean it stands still. It continues onwards on time's linear flow, unable to turn back.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: But all that life discovers and creates is doomed to fall into an inextricable cycle.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Mathematics, physics, philosophy, theology... These theories and practicalities, among others, cannot inspire hope as they once did.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: The ascending spiral has failed. Life squanders its future as it stumbles blindly in the dark.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: So... this is as far as we can go?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Only as defined by Terra's current knowledge. It serves as a limit, yes, but it is also a safeguard.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: A safeguard?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Some kind of cognitive barrier...

attributes.content: Cognitive?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Like how we can't make sandbeasts calculate wave dynamics.
Even if we gave them all the data and formulae...
All forcing it will do is hurt their brains.

attributes.content: As keen an intuition as ever, Doctor, but not entirely correct.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: DWDB-221E enlightens life at a steady pace to bring it forward. It does not simply reveal fragments of the future to the seeker to create evolutionary leaps that violate the laws of nature and ethics.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Knowledge cannot be unlearned, Amiya. The dreamers who glimpsed the true sky are no longer happy to slumber in ignorance on the ground.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Information beyond civilization's cognitive limits will simply blind them to reality, a deadly poison luring them into annihilation's embrace, throwing their civilization into the abyss.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: And so, this boundary was born.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: But why does it... look so much like a prison made from some giant data server?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It appears in a form your mind can comprehend, like how DWDB-221E appears as a black crown in the material world when accompanying you.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: To a minuscule ant, it is an ouroboric river, forever unable to flow to the sea.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: But to a celestial body whose lifespan stretch to the trillions, it is a gravitational field that will stay with them their entire life, unfathomable, inescapable.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: You walk towards a section but one step away from the void. The distant singularity at the core calls to you.
Information washes past you like gentle waves, showing you glimpses of many fascinating sights.
They are fleeting shadows of your past, a life you have lost and forgotten.
Stray visions of an 'unfamiliar' era.
Be careful, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya tugs on your hand.
We don't know what will happen if you fall off this boundary—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are these... what you saw...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: ...Our minds are as one...;...What I see, you see...

attributes.content: —'The Originium slug egg' 'went through the bridge between stars'—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...So all those stories really did happen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: 'The Originium slug egg'?;'Went through the bridge between stars'?

attributes.content: When I was really, really young, I met someone who was incredibly caring.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That care was matched with a great weakness, but also a stubborn insistence in carrying me across a road laden with Originium shards.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When I was dizzy with fever, yet too scared of nightmares to sleep, a patient voice regaled me with stories I had never heard before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In a dark and cramped cave, difficult-to-find ore samples were smashed without the slightest hesitation—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And the shining stones were scattered across the walls, and used to tell me tales of the stars, and the heavenly paradise above the clouds.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Would you like to hear one of those stories, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: ......;I would be happy to.

attributes.content: There was once someone who drove a mysterious vehicle shaped like an Originium slug egg on their lonesome, who went through the bridge between stars.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On the most quiet of nights, guides would borrow glowing clouds from old stars and make round mirrors out of them to light the way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On the other side of the bridge, spires faded in and out of the clouds, and the stars wore crowns of flowers.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When descending on that crown, you'll see that it's a really, really big playground, one where lovely little children gather to play.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it was hard for the vehicle's driver to stop...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The driver changed over to the most miraculous vehicle on hand, and drove it for many, many years...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the years came to an end, and nobody was left.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nobody but the driver.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Do you mean... me?;Is the person in your story... me?

attributes.content: Amiya grips your hand tightly.
Yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thanks to my infection, it's hard for me to remember much from that time, and there's a lot from those stories I don't understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I will do everything I can to remember every single one of your stories.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because they are my stories. Tales you told to me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't want to forget them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I never thought today would be the day I finally get to share your gift to me with you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This time, we witnessed it together, you and I. We got to know this past life of yours once more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Thank you, Amiya...

attributes.content: Do you long for this kind of life, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I do.;I don't.

attributes.content: I'm not surprised. I'm very much the same. When I first thought of such wonders, I longed for it too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's the kind of life I could never truly have for myself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I couldn't help myself from sharing them with Theresa, and the two of us would add many wondrous details of our own imagining—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Until it changed beyond recognition, flying ever further out of reach...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But now that I've had a glimpse with my own eyes, I don't think I'm that far away from your past life.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you believe that one day, this great land will be just as beautiful, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I believe.;That day will come.;Perhaps it will be even more beautiful...

attributes.content: It will, and we'll be there to greet it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will be there to see the light of dawn.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You don't? Strange, it was such a beautiful life.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: One without the pain of Oripathy, without conflict or war, where children could live their lives in joy...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Maybe I didn't want to show you the crueler side of things.;There's always two sides to life, Amiya.

attributes.content: Maybe you're right. The cruelty behind the happiness, the joy behind the suffering. We've experienced it all ourselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll admit, I shared these wondrous stories with Theresa, and she was just as amazed as I was.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She always hoped that everyone in Kazdel... no, in all the lands would have the chance to experience such a life. She did her best to see it come true.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can't let things slide back, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There may come a day that Rhodes Island will be able to see this beauty flourish across the land.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: So, what next?

attributes.content: 'Deep Dive'.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: The intact data stored within DWDB-221E is decoded by the singularity and exported in a moderated and suitable format as information.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: However, Amiya on her own will not be able to break through the limits of the baseline logic.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.options: ...Am I a special case, then?

attributes.content: I am not certain, but the possibility is there.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: But how are we supposed to get close to the information once it's exported?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Forgive me, Amiya, but I have no further information on this topic.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: I will search through the clues Kal'tsit left behind, and sort anything that may be of use to you so that it is easier to find.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.options: Perhaps we could build a bridge?

attributes.content: A bridge?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: A bridge to the singularity.;A bridge to knowledge.;Hasn't Kal'tsit already pointed the way for us?

attributes.content: Has anyone done something like that before?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is no precedent in the records.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: ...It's worth a try, either way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then you must be aware of the risks. The closer you get to the singularity, the denser the information will become. You may possibly experience it gaining mass.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: Information with mass?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It is possible here, yes.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: It is also possible that information not yet fully decoded will flood into your mind and destroy it.
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.content: And a destroyed mind means...
attributes.name: Civilight Eterna

attributes.options: Death.

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Don't mind me, traveler. I'm simply watching yet another bout of destruction is all.
attributes.name: Voice From Within

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Hierda. That's your name, right?
attributes.name: Voice From Within

attributes.content: Did you just say my name?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: I don't know whatever language you're speaking in at all. Also, how'd you know—
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: As the Cautus passes by the porthole, she sees the figure out in the darkness of space slowly approach the ship, then disappear from her sights.
Who is that, Raydistorter?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Fervent singing) ♪—♪—♪—
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: —Is something wrong?!
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: There's not many of us who like her!
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Sorry, traveler, I simply can't handle being in the same room as her.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: If my friends saw this, they'd give me the cold shoulder because of it too.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: When the bewildered Cautus snaps out of it, she finds herself the only person in the cabin. Upon foreseeing the arrival of an unwelcome soul, everyone else had made themselves scarce.
Then the Cautus sees her.
No need to look so amazed. I learned how to communicate using long-distance resonance a while ago.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: At the very least, before destroying that odd race, I kept the unique language patterns they had evolved.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: ...D-Destroying?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: Do you detest destruction as well, our newly-come guest?
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: I... am not too sure what happened, to be honest.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: It's nothing too complicated. My people once ate stars to live. Others may hate us for it, but it's simply our survival instinct at work.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: But now, that past only exists in horror stories passed around the metaphorical campfire.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: My people are on the brink of extinction. I fear I may be the last of my kind, in fact.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: We destroy to live, but when true destruction finally bears down upon us, we are powerless in the face of it...
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: From that point onwards, I have become nothing more than a beggar. With the aid of some geniuses, I have changed the method I use to obtain the energy I need to live—
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: It sounds like... You've been trying to blend in with other lifeforms too.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: So when you were out in space looking at that dead planet, were you reminiscing about the destruction you experienced?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Reminiscing?
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: Haha, nothing of the sort.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf

attributes.content: Everyone here has accepted the ruination chasing us with serenity and hope in their hearts.
attributes.name: Mysterious Elf
